body: {"name":"Chocolate Cake","ingredients":["2 cups all-purpose flour","2 cups sugar","3/4 cup unsweetened cocoa powder","2 teaspoons baking soda","1 teaspoon salt","2 eggs","1 cup milk","1/2 cup vegetable oil","2 teaspoons vanilla extract","1 cup boiling water"],"instructions":["Preheat oven to 350°F (175°C).","In a large bowl, combine flour, sugar, cocoa, baking soda, and salt.","Add eggs, milk, oil, and vanilla. Beat on medium speed for 2 minutes.","Stir in boiling water. Batter will be thin.","Pour into a 9x13 inch baking pan.","Bake for 30-35 minutes or until a toothpick inserted comes out clean."]}
